    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init()
        Description copied from class: FXController
        Alternative for method initialize in standard JavaFX controllers. But, there's a difference. When Main.changeScene(String, String) changes scene - this method activates.
        Specified by:
        init in class FXController

      • actionButtonPressed

        public void actionButtonPressed(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Event handler for all menu buttons. Moved in one method because of ActionEvent as param - it was not used.
        Parameters:
        event - event from button.

      • mapFrom2DArray

        private static <K,V> java.util.HashMap<K,V> mapFrom2DArray(java.lang.Object[][] array)
        Makes HashMap from 2D array.
        Type Parameters:
        K - type of keys of new HashMap.
        V - type of values of new HashMap
        Parameters:
        array - source 2D array, where each "column" is pair, and each pair is 2-item array.
        Returns:
        constructed HashMap.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if sub array doesn't contain enough elements to make pair (subArray.length != 2).
